message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 by us due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. We're confident it will provide significant value to you. Would you like to proceed with this offer?

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying, considering the market value. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13500?
